  • class SPI – a master-driven serial protocol
  • View page source

class SPI – a master-driven serial protocol¶

SPI is a serial protocol that is driven by a master. At the physical level there are 3 lines: SCK, MOSI, MISO.

Constructors¶

Methods¶

SPI.deinit()¶

Turn off the SPI bus.

Constants¶
